description: Static analysis and code quality enforcement hooks

hooks.command: bash -c 'echo "NOTICE: If making similar changes to multiple files, consider using an automated tool (formatter, linter with --fix, refactoring tool) instead of manual iteration."'

bash -c 'if echo "$ARGS" | grep -qE "\.(py|js|ts|jsx|tsx|java|go|rs|rb|php|c|cpp|h|hpp)"; then echo "NOTICE: Code modified. Run /quality-check to ensure quality standards are met before committing."; fi'
